remarks: Subspace sum of a closed subspace and the span of a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dihsmsprn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihsmsprn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsmsprn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dihsmsprn.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihsmsprn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dihsmsprn.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsmsprn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihsmsprn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
dihsmsprn.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. V ) $.
dihsmsprn $p |- ( ph -> ( X .(+) ( N ` { T } ) ) e. ran I ) $.
